item.description:
Hi all,

The next STWC meeting will be postponed until Thursday to coincide with the regular meetings of the First Night Peace Fair organizing committee. Various organizations will be participating in the Peace Fair on December 31 (First Night) in Copley Square from 1:00 â€“ 7:00 PM. Please join us:

Thursday, December, 18th at 6:00 PM
Encuentro 5
33 Harrison Avenue, 5th Floor
Boston, MA
(Chinatown Stop on the Orange Line T)

Agenda:
First Night Peace Fair

Our meeting will be followed by a program entitled:
Stopping War at the Point of Production
Presented by Dave Strano of Disrupt! Lake City
item.name: Antiwar meetup -- First Night organizing
